text: Nweûûa amdan ar lewqama s imawlan is. Imma s temêen s tadist, temêen di tinnufra. Ger tadist akked ujumi, caret wagguren. Armi ibbwev d anqaqôi, issawev kuéet isegwasen, inna: "a Mass iw! Eoo iyi a K snemmre$ af l$it i $ T$atev, nek akked lwaldin iw; ad xedme$ ayen ilhan ara K iôavin. Efk iyi d tarwa ilhan. Aql i utube$ K, aql i seg imvuâen".
